abstract.para: All types of documentation (printed, electronic, multimedia, etc.) that will be created in the course of Uludag is the responsibility of Documentation project. A consistent wording and feel is among the basic requirements for documentation.

sect1.para:
Within the scope of Uludag Documentation Project:
The information architecture and content management for the documentation system will be carried out, The preparation of manuals for all other projects will be contributed to, The acceptance test for the contributed documentation will be carried out, the relevant process will be defined and a manual will be prepared.
Project contact: Zerrin Çakmakkaya, zerrin@uludag.org.tr
